Adrian Ogletree

I am a research project manager, librarian, homebrewer and knitter. My research interests focus on natural language processing, computational linguistics, and open access.
Start scrolling to learn more about me.

About Me

I am originally from Austin, Texas. I have also lived in Chapel Hill, NC, and currently live in Philadelphia, PA. I work as a research project manager at the Metadata Research Center, located at Drexel University. In my spare time, I like to brew beer, bike around the city, cook, play board games, read, garden (I volunteer at a community garden), and make things (see my knitting projects on Ravelry).
